title: Ticket #1624: Submit shouldn't pad DiskUsage for expanding vm image
description: When calculating the DiskUsage attribute for a vm job, condor_submit adds an extra 100MB because the vm image may be a sparse disk and thus expand during execution. It does no padding for other types of jobs, which usually write output files. The amount of padding seems arbitrary. For these reasons, I believe the padding should be removed.
